Topic.Title: Hey stupidz, sybs here with some friendly financial advice on trading scamazon

Message.Msg: Just remember kiddies.....75% of all trading is algorithms. So is there demand? Is this just little crazy programs freaking out on each other? The more I watch these markets the more I marvel about the fact that the majority of what is happening has nothing to do with a real trade in human terms. I wonder how many nano second trading circles are occurring right now with this stock.
Nje457 has started imitating Sybil's Martingale strategy! Imitating a loser is never good. Look at xdon69.

Topic.Title: Must Be Some P-ssed Shorts Here!

Message.Msg: Eh, hard to say. They are still propping it up as the market went red. I thought maybe they would push it up to the 50DMA. I don't think they'll be able to fully hold it up if the market really goes down but it looks programmed to stay well green today no matter what. Keep in mind gold is up today, not sharply but up and lately when that is going up stocks fake moves like today have often reversed within a day or two. Of course, I am just going by several recent observations so there are no stats behind it.
